itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Dafydd Carter (born 12 February 1992) is a Welsh professional rugby union and rugby league footballer. He played club level rugby union (RU) for Bargoed RFC, as an Inside Centre, and representative level rugby league (RL) for Wales, and at club level for Crusaders and South Wales Scorpions as a stand-off.
